text:
Raskolnikov got up and flopped onto the sofa. He waved his hand weakly at Razumihin, signaling him to stop the overly emotional pep talk he was giving to his mom and sister. He grabbed their hands and stared at them for a minute, lost in thought. His mom looked worriedâ€”his face showed a mix of deep pain and something almost unhinged.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Razumihin reassures Raskolnikov's family after he faints, insisting it is just a minor issue despite their anxiety.
